title: The opioid epidemic: is pharma doing enough to develop treatments for the crisis?
cleaned_text: Even with academic collaborations, private players are lagging behind public institutions in finding new treatments for opioid addiction. [Marco Pravetoni, PhD](https://psychiatry.uw.edu/profile/marco-pravetoni/), is currently working on developing a potential vaccine aimed at oxycodone, which is in Phase I trials, and aims to get vaccines targeting other drugs like fentanyl or heroin into the clinic in the coming years.
